attributes.action: Petition to have musician Tyler, the Creator's ban from the UK lifted
attributes.background: Musician Tyler, the Creator has received a ban from entering the United Kingdom from the secretary of state for the home department of the United Kingdom for lyrics and content created by the individual when he was just 18 years old in 2009. His recent work contain no such violent themes

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/106748

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
